DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to see if blood obtained from a vein (smaller blood vessel) can be used instead of blood obtained from an artery (larger blood vessel).
DOC.brief_title: Agreement Between Arterial, Central Venous, and Peripheral Venous Lactate Measurements in the Intensive Care Unit
DOC.criteria: Patients admitted to the ICU and requiring both an arterial line and central venous line as prt of their clinical care Patient did not desire to participate
